titles: Schism dis-arm'd of the defensive weapons, lent it by Doctor Hammond, and the Bishop of Derry by S.W.
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: This work is in answer to Henry Hammond's "Of schisme", 1653, and John Bramhall's " A just vindication of the Church of England from the unjust aspersion of criminal schism", 1654.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
keywords: Bramhall, John, 1594-1663. --  Just vindication of the Church of England from the unjust aspersion of criminal schisme.
